title: Jyllands-Posten Comparison Website
description: Designed the comparison website and campaign material for Jyllands-Posten at Adservice.
challenge: Adservice is an affiliate company that connects advertisers and publishers. Jyllands-Posten was one of our publishers which wanted to generate revenue with their large traffic, through a comparison solution.
solution: A comparison website and campaign material were designed resulting in several subpages of different popular services.
